definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: forbearing, lacking, [[הֶחָדֵל]] as subst. Ez Eze 3:27 he that forbeareth (opp. [[שׁמע]], cf. [[חָדֵל]]

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: ad fin.); cstr. [[חֲדַל אִישִׁים]] Is 53:3 lacking men (i.e. forsaken by them);—ceasing, transient [[מֶה־חָדֵל אָָנִי]] Ps 39:5, but rd. rather [[חֶלֶד]] v. Che:crit. n.
